notes:
### v1.5.4
#### NEW FEATURES
- added two new accent colors (rose and violet)
- added support identity column (settings > live meter/logs > support identity %). _note: only works on new logs_

![identity](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/220646943498567680/1197486350916669512/app_BiFRacJpfE.png)

![setting](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/220646943498567680/1197501510972616764/app_bY7IgOVdje.png)
#### BUG FIXES
- fix flashing windows on launch when app set to be hidden
- fix identity settings not saving

full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
